QUAD STORED VOLTAGES

1 - 8: SELECT VOLTAGE BANK
CV 1-4: VOLTAGE OUTS
PARAM: SLEW RATE, 0-16320 MS
VOLTAGES IN PN 0 0 THRU PN 3 7
VOLTAGES IN VV FORMAT
F10 SETS ALL OUTS TO 0 NOW



#1
L 1 4: CV I VV PN - I 1 - $ 1

#2
L 1 4: CV I VV PN - I 1 - $ 1

#3
L 1 4: CV I VV PN - I 1 - $ 1

#4
L 1 4: CV I VV PN - I 1 - $ 1

#5
L 1 4: CV I VV PN - I 1 - $ 1

#6
L 1 4: CV I VV PN - I 1 - $ 1

#7
L 1 4: CV I VV PN - I 1 - $ 1

#8
L 1 4: CV I VV PN - I 1 - $ 1

#M
L 1 4: CV.SLEW I PARAM

#I
L 1 4: CV.SLEW I 0; CV I 0
M! 10; M.ACT 1

#P
4	4	4	4
1	1	1	1
0	0	0	0
63	63	63	63

100	200	300	100
200	122	400	18
350	200	400	566
400	200	300	277
